```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(nlme)
```
```{r}
setwd("~/Projects/CommonG/Analysis/Phenotype/Juveniles/")
all.tiles <- read.csv("../../../Data/Oyster Tile Size Data - Length.csv",header = TRUE, na.strings = c("#DIV/0!","#VALUE!","e","gone","g"))
all.tiles
```
```{r}
all.tiles <- mutate(all.tiles, Growth.Rate.1014 = Growth.1014 / 48, Growth.Rate.113 = Growth.113 / 68)
```

```{r}
tiles.oct <- select(filter(all.tiles,!is.na(Growth.1014)),Tile,Population,include,Mean.length.827,Mean.length.1014,Growth.1014,Growth.Adjusted.1014,Mean.length.113,Growth.113,Growth.Adjusted.113,Tray,Stack, Growth.Rate.1014,Growth.Rate.113)
tiles.oct.filt <- filter(tiles.oct,include != "n")
tiles.nov <- select(filter(all.tiles,!is.na(Growth.113)),Tile,Population,include,Mean.length.827,Mean.length.1014,Growth.Adjusted.1014,Growth.1014,Mean.length.113,Growth.Adjusted.113,Growth.113,Tray,Stack,Growth.Rate.1014,Growth.Rate.113)
tiles.nov.filt <- filter(tiles.nov,include != "n")
```
```{r}
dim(tiles.oct)
dim(tiles.oct.filt)
dim(tiles.nov)
dim(tiles.nov.filt)
tiles.oct
```
```{r}
boxplot(Mean.length.827~Population, tiles.oct.filt,main = "Shell Length August 2015",xlab = "Population",ylab = "Juvenile Shell length (mm)")
```

```{r}
boxplot(Growth.Rate.1014~Population, tiles.oct.filt,main = "Juvenile Shell Growth Rate August - October 2015",xlab = "Population",ylab = "Shell Growth (mm/day)")
```
```{r}
boxplot(Growth.Adjusted.1014~Population, tiles.oct.filt,"Adjusted Juvenile Growth August - October 2015",xlab = "Population",ylab = "Adjusted Shell Growth (mm)")
```
```{r}
boxplot(Growth.Rate.113~Population, tiles.nov.filt,main = "Juvenile Shell Growth Rate August - November 2015",xlab = "Population",ylab = "Shell Growth (cm/day)")
```
